alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Spalding, Fayette, west central Henry, eastern Coweta and southern Clayton Counties through 600 PM EST ... At 530 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Thomas Crossroads to near Luthersville, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Hampton, Tyrone, Lovejoy, Senoia, Brooks, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, Woolsey, Lake Spivey, Starrs Mill, Inman, Jw Smith Reservoir, Birdie, and Vaughn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
